course_titles.course_title: Udacity Front End Web Developer Nanodegree

courses.title: Udacity Front End Web Developer Nanodegree
courses.alt_image: Udacity Front End Web Developer Nanodegree

courses.title: Project 1 - Logs Analysis
courses.alt_image: Coding Graphic
courses.description: Portfolio Site - Demonstrate HTTP, CSS, using Flexbox and Responsive Design.

courses.title: Project 2 - Memory Game
courses.alt_image: Memory Game Graphic
courses.description: Memory Game - Demonstrate JavaScript, HTTP, CSS, and Responsive Design with a Matching Game.

courses.title: Project 3 - Classic Arcade Game
courses.alt_image: Feed Reader Testing Project Graphic
courses.description: Classic Arcade Game - Fun game to demonstrate Object Oriented JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, and a game engine.

courses.title: Project 4 - Feed Reader Testing
courses.alt_image: Feed Reader Testing Project Graphic
courses.description: Feed Reader Testing - This project is a demonstration of writing JavaScript test-suites using Jasmine for a RSS Feed Reader program.  Demonstrates Jasmine and JavaScript Testing Frameworks skills.

courses.title: Final Project - Restaurant Reviews
courses.alt_image: Restaurant Reviews Project Graphic
courses.description: Restaurant Reviews - This project is a demonstration of several Front End Web Development skills: working with Service Workers / Offline web design, A11Y accessibility, responsive web design, and using map API's, html, javascript, and CSS.

course_titles.course_title: Udacity Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree

courses.title: Udacity Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree
courses.alt_image: Udacity Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree

courses.title: Project 1 - Logs Analysis
courses.alt_image: Newspaper Press
courses.description: News Analysis - This project uses a vagrant VM and PostgreSQL. The python program uses back-end SQL queries to help demonstrate a log-analysis example, utilizing joins, parsing paths, HTML status, etc.

courses.title: Project 2 - Item Catalog
courses.alt_image: Card Catalog
courses.description: Item Catalog - This program demonstrates CRUD operations using an Item Catalog.  This program demonstrates OAuth2 authentication and authorization using a third party provider.  This program demonstrates API endpoints.

courses.title: Final Project - Fullstack Web Catalog Server
courses.alt_image: G650ER jet
courses.description: Ace's High Aviation - Example of Python Flask WSGI live web server AWS Lightsail linux server deployment demonstrating CRUD operations, OAUTH2 login, and API endpoints, using a PostgreSQL back-end.

course_titles.course_title: Udacity AI Programming in Python Nanodegree

courses.title: Udacity AI Programming in Python Nanodegree
courses.alt_image: Udacity AI Programming in Python Nanodegree

courses.title: Project 1 - Dog Breed Image Classifier
courses.alt_image: Miniature schnauzer
courses.description: This project demonstrates an Image Classifier, specifically using PyTorch to identify a Dog Breed from an image.

courses.title: Final Project - Create Your Own Image Classifier
courses.alt_image: Pink Primrose
courses.description: This project demonstrates an Image Classifier, specifically using PyTorch to identify Flower Species from an image.

courses.title: Happy Birthday App
courses.alt_image: Happy Birthday App
courses.description: Google Android Basics in Kotlin course:  An introductory happy birthday Kotlin android app.

courses.title: Dice Roller App
courses.alt_image: Dice Roller App
courses.description: Google Android Basics in Kotlin course:  App to roll a single dice.

courses.title: Tip Time App
courses.alt_image: Tip Time App
courses.description: Google Android Basics in Kotlin course:  App to calculate tips, as the course progresses through further code and design components.  Topics covered included class hierarchy, variables and functions with inheritance, abstract class, overriding, and private vs. public variables.  Also Material Design, themes, styles, added an icon for the app, and icons within the app, as well as learning about different UI components, light and dark mode.
